General.Name: Kindly MD, Inc. Common Stock
General.Description: Kindly MD, Inc., a healthcare and healthcare data company, provides direct health care services to patients integrating prescription medicine and behavioral health services. The company offers specialty outpatient clinical services based on a subscription and fee-for-service basis to augment traditional healthcare. It provides evaluation and management services, including chronic pain, functional medicine, cognitive behavioral therapy, trauma and addiction therapy, recovery support, overdose education, peer support, limited urgent care, preventative medicine, travel, and hormone therapy; and data collection and research, and online and email campaign marketing services. Kindly MD, Inc. was formerly known as Utah Therapeutic Health Center, LLC and changed its name to Kindly MD, Inc. in March 2022. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is based in Salt Lake City, Utah.
General.Address: 5097 South 900 East, Salt Lake City, UT, United States, 84117
